SEARCH
Package com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.service

Record Class FleetService

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.service.FleetService
Record Components:
fleet - the Fleet managed by this service
public record FleetService(Fleet fleet) extends Record
Service façade that mediates between the GUI layer and the Fleet domain model.

OOP concept – Modularity: the GUI panels never access the Fleet directly; they depend only on this service, keeping presentation and domain logic separated.

OOP concept – Aggregation: FleetService holds a reference to a Fleet but does not create it; the fleet can outlive the service (weak "has-a").

    • totalOperatingCost

      public double totalOperatingCost()
      Calculates the total operating cost across all vehicles.

      Polymorphism: each vehicle’s concrete calculateOperatingCost() is invoked at runtime.

      Returns:
      sum of all vehicle operating costs
